name: Angelic Assassin
description:
Right mouse button - pistol
Middle mouse button - knife
Left Mouse button - fire / take cover
R - reload

XBOX/PS4 enabled maybe, but not tested

Known bugs:
-Someone forgot to bake lights
-Ending up in the nether (physics issue)
-Stray/inert fireballs will kill you
-Mouse gets camera stuck in unexpected positions
-Settings (sensitivity and volume) are not preserved between playthroughs

Room for improvement:
-AI search speed tweak
-Audio cue on low ammo
-Improve control schemes

New features on the way
-Textures for many of the 3D assets
-Tutorial level
-A close button
